postReview.title: Emery praises Duran's start to the season
postReview.description: Despite constant speculation about his future in the summer, Unai Emery has praised Jhon Duran's attitude and early performances.

preReview.title: Emery tempers top six aspirations ahead of East Midlands derby
preReview.description: Aston Villa suffered their first loss of the season last weekend, but will be looking to bounce back against East Midlands rivals Leicester.

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Aston Villa on Sat, 31 Aug 2024 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Aston Villa won 2–1 over Leicester City on Sat, 31 Aug 2024 14:00:00 GMT.
